page.title: 01EDUCATION IN LLANGYNIDR
page.content: LLANGYNIDR IS A SMALL VILLAGE WITH A PRIMARY SCHOOL. THERE ARE 118 CHILDREN IN THE SCHOOL, 9 TEACHERS AND 5 CLASSES. THE AGE RANGE IS FROM 4-11. IT IS SITUATED NEAR A CHURCH ON AN ESTATE CALLED CHURCH CLOSE. SOME OF THE SUBJECTS THAT ARE TAUGHT ARE MUSIC, ENGLISH, MATHS AND SWIMMING. MOST OF THE TEACHERS LIKE THE AGE GROUP THAT THEY ARE TEACHING. PLAYSCHOOL IS HELD IN THE VILLAGE HALL. THE PURPOSE OF IT IS SO THAT THE LITTLE CHILDREN CAN GET TOGETHER. THEY CAN'T START PLAYSCHOOL UNTIL THEY ARE 3 TO 4 YEARS OLD. MOTHER AND TODDLERS' IS EDUCATION FOR THE YOUNGER CHILDREN OF THE VILLAGE. THE PURPOSE OF MOTHERS AND TODDLERS' IS THAT THE MOTHERS CAN MEET UP WITH OTHER MOTHERS WHO HAVE CHILDREN THE SAME AGE AND ALSO THE TODDLERS CAN GET TOGETHER. ABOUT 20 CHILDREN ATTEND .
